<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>After the Submission has been submitted for review, user should no longer be able to edit the record and related lists.</description><name>x_560219_se_skill_assessment.*</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[//if submission state is not 0 <<after submission>>, answer is true
//current: related list
//parent: record's linked with related list
answer = true;
if(current.parent!='' && current.parent.getDisplayValue().indexOf('SUBM') >-1){
	if(current.parent.state!=0)
	{
		answer=false;
	}
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-19 20:29:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>de14b13bdbcde8101738656b4b9619d8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_560219_se_skill_assessment.*</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Skill Evaluation" source="x_560219_se">efb54d9bdb85a8101738656b4b9619c5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Skill Evaluation">efb54d9bdb85a8101738656b4b9619c5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_de14b13bdbcde8101738656b4b9619d8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-19 21:07:25</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
